title: The Tycoon's Princess Bride: A Contemporary Royal Romance
description: Tall, dark and dangerous--the man from Mont Avellana...Black-hearted billionaire Domenic Vincini wants the lush riches of rival island Niroli, including the jewel in Niroli's crown--Princess Isabella Fierezza. She's forbidden, but to Domenic, a man scarred inside and out, that makes her innocence all the more appealing. If Isabella gives in to temptation she'll tie herself--and her kingdom--to its sworn enemy...
author: Natasha Oakley
